attributes.action: a vote of no confidence and call for a genral election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The head of the current government is not a competent leader and we petition to call for a general election in 2008.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
